attributes.action: Make MPs who announced their stepping down at the next election as a result of expenses irregularities, resign immediately thereby forfeiting the tax free resettlement grant and winding up allowance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MPs who have decided to stand down at the next election as a result of the expenses row are eligble for a resettlement grant and winding up allowance tax free.

This apparently would not be available to a MP standing down immediately.

They have brought this on themselves through greed at taxpayers expense. They should not profit again.

No other worker in the private or public sector would be allowed to profit tax free.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
